example.name: nice and clear
example.text: State and city officials are still negotiating with developers [*-1] to renovate historic theaters and build and operate a merchandise mart and hotel.

roleset.note: Many cases with tough trace chains. Be careful, and don't be afraid to leave infinitives without and explicit agent (arg0: *, in other words).
